xwikidoc.content:
platform.core.profile.category.notifications=通知 notifications.filters.cancel=取消 notifications.filters.submit=保存 notifications.filters.type.label=过滤类型： notifications.filters.type.hint=过滤器应如何处理指定位置的事件 notifications.filters.location.label=过滤范围： notifications.filters.location.hint=过滤器应该关注Wiki的哪一部分？
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=高级过滤选项 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=默认情况下会激活这些过滤器，您可以使用过滤器旁边的按钮以禁用它们。 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=过滤器名称 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=描述 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=切换 notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=关闭
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=系统过滤器 notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=隐藏系统用户的通知 notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=自己的事件过滤器 notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=隐藏有关您自己活动的通知 notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=读取事件过滤器（警报） notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=隐藏标记为已读的通知 notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=读取事件过滤器（电子邮件） notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=隐藏标记为已读的通知 notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=小事件（警报） notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=隐藏有关页面上的微小更改的通知 notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=小事件（电子邮件） notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=隐藏有关页面上的微小更改的通知
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=范围通知过滤器 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=仅限页面 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=页面和子项 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=Wiki notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.user=用户
## Notifications toggles notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=如果您想监视这些位置，则需要在设置中启用通知
## Notifications formats notifications.format.alert=警报 notifications.format.email=邮件 notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=删除中... notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=过滤器偏好已删除！ notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=删除过滤器偏好失败 notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=保存中... notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=过滤器偏好已保存！ notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=保存过滤器偏好失败 notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=-
## System Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=系统过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=系统过滤器，您可以切换这些过滤器以更精细地控制您想要接收的通知。 ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=名字 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterDescription=描述 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=描述 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=公式 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=是否启用？
## Custom Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=自定义过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=创建过滤器来控制你想要接收的提醒信息。 ## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterPreferenceId=标识符 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.scope=范围 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.location=位置 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=过滤器操作 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=事件 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=格式 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=是否启用？ notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=操作 notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=通知事件 notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=忽视事件 notifications.settings.addFilter=添加过滤器 notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=为特定位置发生的事件创建一个过滤器。根据事件和通知渠道，该过滤器可以触发通知的发送或阻止其发送。 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=位置 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=在所选择的位置上，启用这些事件过滤器。请选择一个或者更多位置。 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=操作 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=此过滤器可以通知或忽略在选定位置发生的事件。选择您想要对这些事件采取的操作。 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=通知事件 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=忽略该事件 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=通道 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=此过滤器仅适用于通过以下选定的通信通道发送的通知。请选择一个或多个通信通道。 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=事件 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=此过滤器适用于在此处选定的事件以及在上方选定的位置中发生的事件。请选择一个或多个事件。 notifications.menu.header=通知 notifications.menu.header.settings=设置 notifications.menu.clear=清空所有 notifications.menu.clearing=正在清除通知 notifications.menu.cleared=通知已被清除 notifications.settings.title=通知首选项 notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=您需要成为管理员才能看到这一点。 notifications.settings.menu=通知菜单 notifications.settings.menu.hint=通知菜单位于页面的右上角，您可以通过单击铃声图标（{0}）来查看 notifications.settings.email=电子邮件 notifications.settings.email.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.email.disabled=通知电子邮件已禁用。请联系您的管理员。 notifications.settings.email.hint=系统会定期向您发送一封电子邮件，其中包含Wiki上发生的情况摘要 notifications.settings.email.title=Email首选项 notifications.settings.email.frequency=电子邮件频率 notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=选择您希望收到电子邮件的频率，其中包含Wiki上发生的内容摘要。 notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=选择您希望接收的有关电子邮件中所有更改的详细信息级别。 notifications.settings.saving=您的设置正在保存中...... notifications.settings.saved=已保存！ notifications.settings.savingfailed=保存您的设置失败 notifications.settings.filters=过滤器（{0}） notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=错误：您必须选择Wiki，而不是页面 notifications.settings.preferences=首选项 notifications.settings.preferences.hint=捕获正在发生的事件并通过流或电子邮件将它们发送出去。 notifications.settings.applications.title=应用 notifications.settings.applications.hint=这是可以发送通知的应用程序列表。您可以启用或禁用其中任何一个。 notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.applications.appName=名称 notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=切换来自 {0} 应用程序的通知详情。 notifications.settings.events=事件 notifications.settings.watch.title=已监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=自动监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=在您完成工作后决定是否要监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.watch.disabled=已监视的实体被禁用，请联系您的管理员。 notifications.events.by=由{0}编辑。 notifications.events.lastChange=最后更改：{0}。 notifications.events.lastComment=最后评论：{0}。 notifications.preferences.scope.table.scope=范围 notifications.preferences.scope.table.location=位置 notifications.preferences.scope.table.scopeFilterType=过滤器类型 notifications.preferences.scope.table._actions=操作 notifications.email.title=wiki上的事件： notifications.email.subject=Wiki上的{0}个事件 notifications.email.seeChanges=更改：{0} notifications.email.linkDetails=查看详情 notifications.rss.feedLink=RSS订阅 notifications.rss.feedLinkDescription=通知的事件订阅源 notifications.rss.feedTitle=通知RSS提要 notifications.rss.feedDescription=此RSS源可以在您的个人资料页面上自定义。 notifications.rss.seeChanges=更改：{0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitleWithPage=New event on {0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitle=New event notifications.globalsettings.email=通知电子邮件 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_daily=每天 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_hourly=每小时 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_weekly=每周 ### Missing: XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_live=Live XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType=更改的详细信息 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType_NOTHING=没有 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType_STANDARD=标准 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationPreferenceScopeClass_scopeFilterType_inclusive=包括的 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationPreferenceScopeClass_scopeFilterType_exclusive=独家 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_NONE=从不 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_ALL=每次我做一个修改 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_MAJOR=每次我做一个重大修改 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_NEW=只有当我创建一个新页面时
## Common notification settings errors notifications.settings.error.userReferenceNotSupported=提供的用户引用不受支持，目前仅支持文档用户引用（DocumentUserReference）。 notifications.settings.error.userReferenceAdminForbidden=您没有对指定用户 {0} 的管理权限。 notifications.settings.error.badCSRF=CSRF 令牌无效（网络安全防御令牌）。 notifications.settings.badParameters=错误的参数请求。
## User profile notifications.userprofile.following=已关注 notifications.userprofile.notfollowing=未关注 notifications.userprofile.follow=开始关注 notifications.userprofile.unfollow=停止关注 notifications.userprofile.done=完成 notifications.userprofile.saving=保存中... notifications.userprofile.error=保存通知设置时出错
## Macros description rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.name=通知应用程序偏好 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.description=显示当前用户关于通知应用程序的偏好。 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.name=目标 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.description=宏的目标（可以是当前用户的“用户”或当前Wiki的“wiki”） rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.name=通知自动监视偏好 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.description=显示当前用户关于自动监视页面的偏好。 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.name=目标 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.description=宏的目标（可以是当前用户的“用户”或当前wiki的“wiki”）
## Toggle notification filters labels notifications.filters.preferences.label.page=仅切换页面通知 notifications.filters.preferences.label.space=切换页面和子通知 notifications.filters.preferences.label.wiki=切换Wiki通知
## Notifications switches notifications.switches.tooltip.page=监视该页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.pageAndChildren=监视该页面及其所有子页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.space=监视父页面及其所有子页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.wiki=监视该Wiki notifications.switches.changeStatusError=无法更改通知的状态。
## Watch button and modal
notifications.watch.button.title=当前此页面的通知设置为：{0} - 点击此处进行更改 notifications.watch.button.status.notset=未设置 notifications.watch.button.status.followed=已关注 notifications.watch.button.status.blocked=已屏蔽 notifications.watch.button.status.custom=自定义 notifications.watch.modal.title=此页面的通知设置 notifications.watch.modal.description.options=您可以使用以下选项更改当前的通知设置： ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.ancestoroption=You can either go to {0} and modify the notification settings there or directly apply settings on the current page with the following options: ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page and children watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page and its children: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.NOT_SET=Not set watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.NOT_SET=You haven't configured any settings for watching this page yet and so you are not following this page: you won't receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page and children watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page and its children: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.CUSTOM=Custom watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.CUSTOM=You are using custom notification settings for this page: you might be following or blocking specific events for the page or you might target only specific channels for the notifications. We invite you to review your notification settings from your profile. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.title=Follow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.title=Follow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.title=Follow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will receive notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.title=Block current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.hint=You will block any notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.title=Block current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.hint=You will block any notifications for that page and all of its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.title=Unfollow current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.title=Unfollow current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.hint=You will stop receiving notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.title=Unfollow entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop receiving notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.title=Unblock current page ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.hint=You will receive notifications for that page only. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.title=Unblock current page and its children ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.hint=You will receive notifications for that page and its children. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.title=Unblock entire wiki ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.hint=This option doesn't only impact current page or space: you will stop ignoring notifications for any page in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.close=Close without saving ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.savechanges=Save changes ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.gotosettings=Manage all notifications settings
## Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.title=过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.hint=创建过滤器以更精确地控制活动事件何时应触发通知。 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知过滤器。
## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.name=名称 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.filterType=过滤器类型 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.eventTypes=事件 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.notificationFormats=格式 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.isEnabled=确定要启用？ notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table._actions=操作 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.inclusive=包含的 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.exclusive=独占 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.label=通知格式 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.hint=该过滤器应采用哪种格式的通知？ notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.label=事件类型 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.hint=过滤器应该针对哪种事件类型？ notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.label=过滤范围 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.hint=过滤器应该针对哪个页面？
## Filter Types notifications.filters.type.inclusive=包括的 notifications.filters.type.exclusive=独家
## until 16.2.0RC1 ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.description=This table lists every custom filter registered for the given user or current wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.description=This table lists every system filter registered in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.name=Location
